data.name: Fantasy Grounds - More Monsters 3 (Token Pack)
data.detailed_description:
This product is a token module containing top-down style tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop.

This token pack contains 24 tokens you can use to represent various monsters or NPCs in your campaigns.

This token pack contains:

  • 5 Demons
  • Dino Devourer
  • 3 Driders
  • 3 Dryads
  • Few Drake
  • 2 Flying Stalkers
  • Forest Giant
  • Gyno Sphinx (normal and human form)
  • 2 Insectiods
  • Jackal
  • 3 Jackalweres

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on January 21, 2016. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.1.6 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

data.short_description: This product is a token module containing top-down style tokens for use with the Fantasy Ground virtual tabletop.This token pack contains 24 tokens you can use to represent various monsters or NPCs in your campaigns.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
